content: Ever since my teenage years, I’ve been captivated by the world of Linux and Open Source. This early interest has shaped my career path, focusing primarily on creating Software using the Java ecosystem. Today I focus on creating evolutionary software through the means of extreme programming.
summary: Ever since my teenage years, I’ve been captivated by the world of Linux and Open Source.

content: ⛵ Navigating the realm of Java, Software Architecture and Testing with in-depth explorations and practical insights.

title: Jonas on Software
